name: Laser League
description: Vaporize the opposition in the light-speed future of sport. An all new multiplayer experience - easy to pick up, but near impossible to put down, Laser League starts as a simple test of your reflexes, but soon becomes a strategic showdown with deep team tactics.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 @ 3GHz or AMD A 10-5800K APU @3.78GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon R9 270x DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card Additional Notes: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
